caption.title: Generalised linear mixed effects models (GLMM) predicting the change in sperm velocity (VAP, µs−1) observed in the focal male’s sperm when incubated in either their own seminal fluid or the seminal fluid of their rival male in that dyad, using the social status of the rival male and the relative VAP between sperm from focal and rival males as measured in their own seminal fluid (n = 42 males in 39 dyads).
caption.p: p-Values are calculated using Satterthwaite approximations to degrees of freedom and 95% confidence intervals were calculated using the Wald method. Significant values are highlighted in bold.
